code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={user:null};export var loginAuthSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:initialState,reducers:{login:function login(state,action){state.user=action.payload;},logout:function logout(state){state.user=null;}}});var _loginAuthSlice$actio=loginAuthSlice.actions,login=_loginAuthSlice$actio.login,logout=_loginAuthSlice$actio.logout;export{login,logout};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.user.user;};export default loginAuthSlice.reducer;
